        Creates a new wallet, overloaded to specify the access lvl, name, and stored currency
        Parameters:
        owner - the User object that will own this wallet
        walletName - the String name this wallet will have
        access - the bool of whether this wallet will be public
        walletID - the UUID of this wallet
        currency - the double of how much currency this wallet contains
        Returns:
        the newly created Wallet object
